review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Terminal text rendering fixes: 3 changes across terminal.js and renderer.js. (1) PTY resize sync after fitAddon.fit() in initTerminal — two-phase approach for pre/post PTY creation, try/catch guarded. (2) PTY resize sync in reattachTerminal — single call since PTY exists. (3) toggleExpandPane timer replaced with transitionend listener + 300ms fallback. All three resize paths now consistent. Cross-file data flow verified: fitAddon.fit() → terminal.cols/rows → pty.resize() → daemon. Edge cases checked: display:none, rapid toggling, 0x0 dimensions. Confidence HIGH.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
